## VMKeyboard.down() method

Sends a low-level keydown event to the virtual machine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
down(key: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | Name of the key (cf [Key](./vm-providers.key.md)<!-- -->) or its corresponding character, for example <code>PageUp</code> or <code>a</code>. If the character requires to press the <code>Shift</code> key to be produced, a keydown and a keyup event for the <code>Shift</code> key are also sent before and after. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
